trans-unit.source: Indicates the entity set to which a client data service class belongs.
trans-unit.target: 表示設定用戶端資料服務類別所屬的實體。

trans-unit.source: The EntitySetAttribute class is used by the client during data binding to determine the name of the entity set to which a class belongs.
trans-unit.target: EntitySetAttribute 類別是用戶端使用資料繫結期間判斷之實體集所屬類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is generated by the `Add Service Reference` dialog box when the Binding option is used and by the tool when the `/binding` option is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性由產生`Add Service Reference`對話方塊使用的繫結選項時，工具時`/binding`提供選項。

trans-unit.source: You must apply the EntitySetAttribute to any user-supplied client data service classes that are used with data binding.
trans-unit.target: 您必須將 EntitySetAttribute 套用至搭配資料繫結會使用任何使用者提供的用戶端資料服務類別。

trans-unit.source: EntitySetAttribute is only supported when there is one entity set associated with the type.
trans-unit.target: 一個型別相關聯的實體集時，才支援 EntitySetAttribute。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.EntitySetAttribute"></xref>.
The entity set to which the class belongs.
Gets the entity set to which the class belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定此類別所屬的實體。

trans-unit.source: The entity set as string value.
